name: Bitsymod
description:
Bitsymod 
Hacking the bitsy gamemaker html / js code to extend the capabilities of the "engine". 

From the bitsy website:
" Bitsy is a little editor for little games or worlds. The goal is to make it easy to make games where you can walk around and talk to people and be somewhere. "

Bitsy is a very good way of hammering out little games without any programming. The engine code itself is very readable and is written in such a way that it is extensible. It is the goal of the Bitsymod project to push the Bitsy game engine to design more sophisticated games. 

This is just a demo to showcase what features have been added thus far.

Features Wish-list:

- Mobile NPCs (in progress) 

-  "Cartridge" representation of game data

- Audio
